posts.post_content:
I was sorting through my t206s and came across a sovereign green apple sam crawford with bat... I read somewhere that these were rare and typically commanded a premium... If so, what is the premium for such cards? I purchased this one in a halls nostalgia auction in the early 90's for around $30, unfortunately upon close examination it looks to be trimmed (ow would probably rate vg with no creases...

Any help would be greatly appreciated

Thanks, 
Dave

Psif anyone is interested please let me know... open to trade... Always looking for hof autographed 3x5's and Cuts (Frisch, Greenberg, Grove etc...)
Here, Dave - now you own the sub-forum.  I recommend you simply put a price on it and forget about it.
